mapper.select:
select
distinct
from M013MAKM
where (MKR_CD, HAKKO_DAY) in (select MKR_CD, MAX(HAKKO_DAY) from M013MAKM
group by MKR_CD)
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select:
select count(*) from M013MAKM
where (MKR_CD, HAKKO_DAY) in (select MKR_CD, MAX(HAKKO_DAY) from M013MAKM
group by MKR_CD)

mapper.sql: MKR_CD CODE, MKR_NM NAME, MKR_NM_R SHORT_NAME, ACT_KBN KUBUN
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from M013MAKM
where (MKR_CD, HAKKO_DAY) in (select MKR_CD, MAX(HAKKO_DAY) from M013MAKM
group by MKR_CD) AND DELETE_FLG = '0'
order by ${orderByClause}
